body:
Hello, sorry I missed your request. It looks like the site's up again so I hope you had a chance to read it.  For anyone else, if the site goes down again these are the details: Solar Availability in Cities
ISSN: 1833-7570, Issue No. 006, May 15, 2012
Solar Availability in Cities: A Design Approach
By: Spyros Stravoravdis and Andrew Marsh. Probably can get it from cumincad, or the like.
